content: granny scarf no 1 by cleo malone yarn abbreviations 436 yards of fingering weight yarn beg / beginning chain / chain hook double_crochet / double_crochet us h / 5 mm space / space st s / stitch es gauge 5 stitches and 2 row per inch in double_crochet after blocking repeat instructions in brackets in the directed place and/or the number of measurements times indicated 58 long 8 wide pattern 1 chain 49 2 turn double_crochet twice into 4th chain from hook chain 1 skip next two sts double_crochet twice into next st to end of row 3 chain 3 turn double_crochet twice into next chain 1 space chain 1 to last chain 1 space double_crochet twice in between last row s beg chain and first double_crochet 4 repeat step 3 until scarf measures 58 long or desired length 5 fasten_off weave in ends and block to measurements
